name: Pacifist
description: Character will not take violent action unless her life is at stake

name: Darkeyes
description: Character is born of the lower class. He will find many doors closed to him.

name: Yellow
description: Your character is squeamish to a fault. At the sight of blood, he is likely to faint.

name: Slow
description: Whether because of long-standing injury or general lack of fitness, your character is slower than most

name: Brash
description: Your character doesn't know when to keep his mouth shut and it often gets him in trouble.

name: Doubting Thomas
description: Your character doesn't believe in the supernatural, even if it's staring her in the face.

name: Young
description: Your character hasn't hit the age of maturity yet. He is underdeveloped and likely not to be taken as seriously as a fully-grown member of his race

name: Headstrong
description: Your character knows the right path and will boldly take it, naysayers be damned

name: Seasick
description: Your character doesn't have sea legs. While traveling on water, he is always considered vulnerable

name: Unlucky
description: Your character has run out of luck more times than she can count. You start each session with one fewer benny.

name: Simple
description: Your character isn't blessed by intellect. Oftentimes complex ideas completely pass him up
